---
name: Security issue
about: Report a security vulnerability or sensitive issue
title: "[SECURITY] "
labels: security
assignees: ''
---

**IMPORTANT**: If this is a vulnerability that should NOT be public, contact the maintainers directly (email or private channel) instead of opening a public issue. You can add instructions here to contact a security mailing address or create a private report channel.

**Summary**
One-line description of the security concern.

**Severity**
Low / Medium / High

**Steps to reproduce / PoC**
If safe to share, provide a proof-of-concept or steps to reproduce. Otherwise provide high-level description and point to a private report.

**Impact**
Describe the potential impact and affected components.

**Mitigation**
Any immediate mitigations or workarounds.

**Contact**
If you prefer a private disclosure, send an email to: security@example.com (replace with project contact) and reference the repo URL.
